welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Norton, a charming city nestled in the heart of the United States. Known for its scenic beauty and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at T. F. Green Airport serves primarily domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at T. F. Green Airport serves primarily domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at T. F. Green Airport serves primarily domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Bedford Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plymouth Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Plymouth Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a variety of dining and shopping options for passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A hub for major airlines, offering a wide range of services and amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at State Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at State Airport is primarily used for regional flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at State Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
